-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394
if not game:IsLoaded() then
    repeat wait() until game:IsLoaded()
end
if game.PlaceId == 9283132959 then 
local library = loadstring(game:HttpGet(('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bloodball/-back-ups-for-libs/main/wall%20v3')))()
local GameName = game:GetService("MarketplaceService"):GetProductInfo(game.PlaceId).Name
local w = library:CreateWindow(tostring(GameName)) -- Creates the window
local CoreGui = game:GetService("StarterGui") 
local b = w:CreateFolder("Farm")
local c = w:CreateFolder("Pets")
local e = w:CreateFolder("Other")
local vu = game:GetService("VirtualUser")
egg = {}
for i,v in pairs(game:GetService("Workspace").EggVendors:GetChildren()) do
    if v.Name ~= "UltimateWeaponsEgg" then
        table.insert(egg,v)
    end
end
b:Toggle("Inf Money",function(bool)
    shared.toggle = bool
    Money = bool
    print(Money,bool)
end)
b:Toggle("Auto ThrowPickaxe",function(bool)
    shared.toggle = bool
    ThrowPickaxe = bool
    print(ThrowPickaxe,bool)
end)
b:Toggle("Auto UpgradeAll",function(bool)
    shared.toggle = bool
    UpgradeAll = bool
    print(UpgradeAll,bool)
end)
b:Toggle("Auto Rebirth",function(bool)
    shared.toggle = bool
    Rebirth = bool
    print(Rebirth,bool)
end)
b:Button("Buy All Area",function()
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(1)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(2)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(3)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(4)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(5)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(6)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(7)
    game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.LevelGUIBuyButtonPressed:FireServer(8)
end)
c:Dropdown("Egg",egg,true,function(a)
    SelectedEgg = a
    print(SelectedEgg)
end)
c:Toggle("Auto Egg",function(bool)
    shared.toggle = bool
    AutoEgg = bool
    print(AutoEgg,bool)
end)
e:Slider("WalkSpeed",{
    min = 20; 
    max = 200; 
    precise = true; 
},function(value)
    spawn(function ()
        pcall(function ()
            game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = value
        end)
    end)
end)
e:Label("Made by SummerTime#0850",{
    TextSize = 15; 
    TextColor = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255); 
    BgColor = Color3.fromRGB(69,69,69); 
    
})
e:Button("Discord server",function()
    setclipboard("https://discord.gg/Yg8BWvEVzE")
    CoreGui:SetCore("SendNotification", {
        Title = "Link Set to clipboard",
        Text = "Link Set to clipboard",
       Duration = 3;
       })
end)
e:DestroyGui()
spawn(function()
    while wait() do
        if Money == true then
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.ClientBrokeBlocks:FireServer(math.huge)
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.SellBlocks:FireServer()
        end
    end
end)
spawn(function()
    while wait() do
        if ThrowPickaxe == true then
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.ThrowPickaxe:FireServer()
        end
    end
end)
spawn(function()
    while wait(.1) do
        if UpgradeAll == true then
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("NumberOfAxes")    
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("BackpackSize")  
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("AxeDamage")   
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("AxeRange")
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("ThrowCooldown")
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerUpgradeAxe:FireServer("AxeEvolution")
        end
    end
end)
spawn(function()
    while wait() do
        if AutoEgg == true then
            local args = {
                [1] = tostring(SelectedEgg)
            }
            
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerPressedKeyOnEgg:FireServer(unpack(args))
        end
    end
end)
spawn(function()
    while wait() do
        if Rebirth == true then
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Events.PlayerRebirth:FireServer()
        end
    end
end)
game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer.Idled:connect(function()
   vu:Button2Down(Vector2.new(0,0),workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame)
   wait(1)
   vu:Button2Up(Vector2.new(0,0),workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame)
end)
CoreGui:SetCore("SendNotification", {
 Title = "Script Loaded",
 Text = "Script Loaded",
Duration = 3;
})
end
